text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Parece que volví a mi forma.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Eso debería ser suficiente para<n>compensar mi
vergüenza en la carrera de<n>exhibición.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Por supuesto. Puede que no lo parezca,<n>pero tengo
un lado bastante competitivo.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Quiero parecer tranquila y<n>serena ante los ojos
del mundo, así que me<n>esfuerzo por no dejarlo
transparentar.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Pero cuando estoy contigo... Bueno, no<n>hay daño
en dejar que una persona vea al<n>verdadero yo,
¿no crees?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ahora entonces, Entrenador. ¿Qué<n>carrera crees
que sería el mejor escenario<n>para que la Emperatriz
revivida<n>reafirme su dominio?
choice_data_list: Let's aim for the Japan Cup.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A fine choice. Equal in prestige to the<n>Big Eight, it
holds the additional<n>distinction of serving as an
international<n>invitational.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Its trophy will make a perfect jewel for<n>the
Emperor's crown.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: Then it's settled. The Japan Cup it is!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: On our way back from the racetrack...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I hear that there's an excellent teahouse<n>just
ahead. Do you know it, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My subordinates in the student council<n>told me
that I had to go if I ever visited<n>Kyoto. What do
you say?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps that was a little unclear... I'm<n>asking if
you want to join me on a little<n>diversion.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haha. Is it really such a shock?
choice_data_list: What about your student council work?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes. I usually head straight to the<n>office after
races, don't I?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well, the student council is as hectic as<n>ever, but
recently I have carved myself<n>out a little
breathing room.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That is to say, I have revised our<n>workflow. I still
have final say on all<n>decisions, but I've stepped
back<n>somewhat from the direct labor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Instead, I have offloaded some<n>responsibility
onto the other members<n>and turned the process
into a more<n>collaborative effort.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: In the past, I tried to do everythingmyself, for better and for worse.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But now, I guide the other members as<n>they strive
in their own ways to realize<n>our collective dream.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
In many ways, it is more taxing than<n>before, both
mentally and physically.<n>Looking after them will
no doubt still<n>strain my schedule.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But I cannot bring about a world of bliss<n>on my
own. The world is built by<n>everyone.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Therefore, everyone has to do their part.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It seems like leaning on others has<n>reduced
Symboli Rudolf's own burden.<n>She seems a lot less
stressed today.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But that's enough about that. I'm itching<n>to try
this tea.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I've heard it's tea-riffic! ...What do you<n>think?
Was that good?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You seem awfully prickly today.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
The two of us pay a visit to the teahouse<n>and
enjoy a tea-riff... um, a delightful<n>time in each
other's company.
